title: Cannot reconnect after restarting the game
body:
load screen is stuck at some point, end progress, reconnect, same shit.

I guess I deserve a loss from that.

replies.body:
Since you didn't mention any Bugsplat or other errors, it sounds like you experienced an *unstable connection* to our gameservers. I strongly recommend going through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so you can ensure this isn't caused by an incompatible network setting local to your PC.

Let me know if this caused any change.
